1.12.2.1.3:
Added: Relative Positional Card.
Added: Comparator output for machines.
Added: World Augment in Desublimator drops/picks up items.
Added: Block Augment in Desublimator places/breaks blocks.
Changed: Rename Positional Card to Absolute Positional Card.
Changed: Condensers with bright fluids now emit light.
Changed: Clean up different iteration modes to work nicer.
Changed: AE2 Machines now act as a dense cable. 32 channels vs 8.
Fixed: Rendering work areas at extreme world positions.

For full changes, see GitHub or CurseForge.
1.12.2.1.2:
Added: Crop Augment
Added: Alternate Iteration Modes (Nearest First, Furthest First, Random, Round Robin)
Added: JEI Integration
Fixed: Crash with Charged Pearls falling into water/lava.
Fixed: Issue with Condenser filling/draining items in inventories that turn into other items when filled/drained.

For full changes, see GitHub or CurseForge.
